anya-e0104n0:5_1: Saṁvaṇṇanāvasena anantarasamādhikathāya āsannapaccakkhataṁ dīpento ‘‘ayaṁ samādhibhāvanā’’ti āha.
anya-e0104n0:5_2: ‘‘Abhiññā sampādetuṁ yogo kātabbo’’ti vatvā tattha payojanavisese dassetuṁ ‘‘evañhī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:5_5: tathāpi pañca lokiyābhiññā yathāvuttasamādhibhāvanāya ānisaṁsabhāvena pākaṭā paññātāti tāsaṁyeva vasena yogino adhigatānisaṁsatā vuttā,
anya-e0104n0:5_8: tathā ca ‘‘samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 3.5; 4.99; 5.1071; netti. 40; mi. pa.
anya-e0104n0:7_2: iddhiṁ vikubbanañcāti evaṁ vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0104n0:7_5: ālokakasiṇañca odātakasiṇantogadhaṁ katvā ‘‘odātakasiṇapariyantesū’’ti vuttaṁ kasiṇānulomādicittaparidamanavidhino adhippetattā,
anya-e0104n0:7_7: Aṭṭha aṭṭhāti yathāvuttesu kasiṇesu ekekasmiṁ aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo.
anya-e0104n0:7_16: Cittaṁ paridametabbaṁ yadicchakaṁ yatthicchakaṁ jhānānaṁ samāpajjanādisukhatthaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:8_6: Yadā hi kasiṇānulomameva ābhujitvā tattha tattha kasiṇe jhānāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:8_9: Yadā pana aṅgasaṅkantiṁ ābhujitvā jhānāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:8_11: Iminā nayena kasiṇānulomaārammaṇasaṅkantiādīnampi aññamaññaṁ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:9_0: Tathevāti ‘‘paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpī’’ti etassa upasaṁhārattho tathā-saddo.
anya-e0104n0:11_3: Tato ākiñcaññāyatananti tato pathavīkasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0104n0:11_4: viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ amanasikaritvā taṁ laṅghitvā yathāvuttaākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassa abhāve pavattitaṁ
anya-e0104n0:11_7: Atha vā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu kassaci ukkamanaṁ idha kasiṇukkantikaṁ nāmāti āha ‘‘kasiṇaṁ anukkamitvā’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:11_9: ukkamanassa ca sarūpaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘evaṁ kasiṇa’’ntiādiṁ vatvā puna taṁ pakāraṁ saha nissayena sesakasiṇesu atidisanto ‘‘evaṁ āpokasiṇādi…pe…
anya-e0104n0:13_0: Lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti lohitakasiṇaṁ āvajjento abhimukhaṁ katvā tassa ugghāṭanena upaṭṭhite
anya-e0104n0:13_1: kasiṇugghāṭimākāse amanasikārena ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tattha pubbe pavattaviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:14_3: Yaṁ pana aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantivacane ‘‘nīlakasiṇaṁ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatana’’ntiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:14_6: Nippariyāyato pana yathā aṅgasaṅkanti rūpajjhānesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:14_8: Tassa tasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇantare pavatti ārammaṇasaṅkanti.
anya-e0104n0:14_9: Tenāha ‘‘sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṁ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṁ nāmā’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:15_0: Yathā pana ‘‘sabbakasiṇesū’’ti iminā ākāsaviññāṇakasiṇānampi saṅgaho hotīti na sakkā vattuṁ idha aṭṭhannaṁyeva kasiṇānaṁ adhigatattā,
anya-e0104n0:15_1: evaṁ sabbampi arūpajjhānaṁ ‘‘ekaṁ jhāna’’nti na sakkā vattuṁ aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ vasena cittaparidamanassa icchitattā.
anya-e0104n0:15_2: Tasmā āruppajjhānānaṁ vasena aṅgārammaṇasaṅkanti pariyāyena vuttāti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:15_12: ārammaṇassa ca ekajjhaṁ aññathā viseso hoti,
anya-e0104n0:15_14: So pana viseso heṭṭhimānaṁ tesaṁ aṅgārammaṇānaṁ samatikkamanavasena hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘ekantarikavasena aṅgānañca ārammaṇānañca saṅkamana’’nti.
anya-e0104n0:15_16: ‘‘idaṁ pathavīkasiṇa’’ntiādinā ārammaṇesu ca vavatthāpitesu ekajjhaṁ tesaṁ vavatthāpane na koci viseso atthīti aṭṭhakathāsu ayaṁ vidhi nābhato.
anya-e0104n0:15_18: anulomapaṭilomakkamena ca ekantarikabhāvena labbhamānampi jhānādīnaṁ ukkamanaṁ na uddhaṭaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:15_19: tehi nayehi vināpi cittaparidamanaṁ ijjhatīti papañcaparihāratthaṁ vā te aṭṭhakathāsu anāgatāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:16_6: Kasiṇaparikammampi bhāroti dosavivajjanādividhinā kasiṇamaṇḍale paṭipatti yāva uggahanimittuppatti kasiṇaparikammaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:16_12: Na hi bhāvanāya vināva nimittavaḍḍhanaṁ labbhati.
anya-e0104n0:16_13: Keci upacārasamādhiṁ labhitvā appanāsamādhiṁ adhigantuṁ na sakkonti,
anya-e0104n0:16_17: añño abhiññānanti āha ‘‘paridamitacittassāpi iddhivikubbanaṁ nāma bhāro’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:16_18: Khippaṁ nisanti nisāmanaṁ jhānacakkhunā pathavīkasiṇādijhānārammaṇassa dassanaṁ etassāti khippanisanti,
anya-e0104n0:16_22: Yathā paṭipakkhavijayāya yodhājīvā nimmalameva asitomarādiṁ gahetvā vicaranti,
anya-e0104n0:16_23: evaṁ bhikkhunāpi kilesavijayāya nimmalāva jhānābhiññā vaḷañjitabbāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:17_1: Taṁ hi khippanisantibhāvatopi garutaraṁ accāyikakiccasādhanavasena vidhātabbato durabhisambhavatarattā.
anya-e0104n0:17_2: Taṁ pana rakkhitattheranidassaneneva siddhampi tato garutarena aṅgāravassaparittāṇena vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya…pe…
anya-e0104n0:17_5: samudde ca yāva yojanā mahatī dīpapūjā.
anya-e0104n0:17_6: Pathaviṁ māpetvāti mārena pavattitaṁ aṅgāravassaṁ phuliṅgamattenapi yāva manusse na pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0104n0:18_7: Tasmāti yasmā pubbahetusampannasseva yathāvuttaṁ bhāvanānukkamaṁ vinā abhiññāyo ijjhanti,
anya-e0104n0:18_10: Yathā cāti ca-saddena lākhākārādīnaṁ lākhākoṭṭanādiṁ avuttampi saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0104n0:18_13: mayhampi sijjhatī’’ti kattukamyatāchandaṁ sīsaṁ dhuraṁ jeṭṭhaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā,
anya-e0104n0:18_14: chandaṁ vā uppādetvā taṁ bhāvanāya mukhaṁ katvā jhānassa samāpajjanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:18_16: ‘‘Āvajjanādivasībhāvavasenā’’ti idaṁ aṭṭhasupi samāpattīsu sātisayaṁ vasībhāvāpādanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:18_20: Pubbahetusampannassa hi yaṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā abhiññā nibbattetabbā,
anya-e0104n0:18_23: ‘‘Catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasinā’’ti vacanato arūpasamāpattiyo vināpi abhiññā ijjhantīti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:19_3: ‘‘Catutthajjhānaṁ upasampajja viharatī’’ti vatvā ‘‘so’’ti vuttattā āha ‘‘adhigatacatutthajjhāno yogī’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:19_12: Yadipi ‘‘eva’’nti idaṁ āgamanasamādhinā saddhiṁ catutthajjhānasamādhānaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:19_13: Satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato padhānanti āha ‘‘catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:19_15: Sabbapaccanīkadhammūpakkilesaparisuddhāya hi paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhānaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:19_18: satisīsena pana tattha desanā katāti āha ‘‘upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:19_19: Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṁsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha ‘‘parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte,
anya-e0104n0:20_6: evaṁ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti āha ‘‘anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:20_12: cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena vasavattitaṁ upagateti attho.
anya-e0104n0:20_13: Vase vattamānaṁ hi cittaṁ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṁ viya cammaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:20_14: suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudunti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:21_4: Ekadhammampīti ekampi sabhāvadhammaṁ na samanupassāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:21_7: sabbaññutaññāṇena olokentopi aññaṁ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi.
anya-e0104n0:22_1: āneñjappatta’’nti ca vuttanti āha ‘‘etesu parisuddhatādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite,
anya-e0104n0:22_5: mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ‘‘ṭhite’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_7: evaṁ phalenāpi kāraṇaṁ niddharīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṁ āneñjappatti.
anya-e0104n0:22_9: paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavantī saddhādibalānaṁ ānubhāvena hotīti ‘‘saddhādīhi pariggahitattā
anya-e0104n0:22_10: āneñjappatte’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vivarituṁ ‘‘saddhāpariggahitaṁ hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_11: Tattha saddhāpariggahitanti evaṁ subhāvitaṁ vasībhāvappattaṁ etaṁ cittaṁ ekaṁsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:22_12: dhammānaṁ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya saṁvattatīti evaṁ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṁ yathāvuttasaddhābalena
anya-e0104n0:22_14: Assaddhiyenāti tappaṭipakkhena assaddhiyena hetunā na iñjati na calati na kampati,
anya-e0104n0:22_20: kusalānañca dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamānāya satiyā upatthambhitaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_22: Paññāpariggahitanti tassā eva bhāvanāya upakārānupakāradhammānaṁ pajānanalakkhaṇāya paññāya upatthambhitaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_24: Obhāsabhūtena hi yathāvuttasamādhānasaṁvaddhitena ñāṇena saṁkilesapakkhaṁ yāthāvato passanto tato utrasanto ottappanto taṁ adhibhavati,
anya-e0104n0:23_8: samāhitassa vā cittassa imāni aṅgānīti ‘‘samāhite’’ti imaṁ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā ṭhitiāneñjappattiyo visuṁ gahetvā imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṁ.
anya-e0104n0:24_2: tathāpi na tathā tehi dūrībhūtā apetā vā yathā catutthajjhānato,
anya-e0104n0:24_3: cetaso malīnabhāvasaṅkhātauppilābhogakarehi nīvaraṇādīhi suṭṭhu vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhi,
anya-e0104n0:24_8: Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṁ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṁ ‘‘aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā
anya-e0104n0:24_14: kathaṁ pana paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā idha vigacchantīti?
anya-e0104n0:24_15: ‘‘Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalānaṁ paṭipakkhā’’ti sallekhapaṭipattivasena evaṁ vuttaṁ jhānassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvadassanato.
anya-e0104n0:24_16: Ye panettha ‘‘icchāvacarānaṁ abhijjhādīna’’nti imehi padehi kopaapaccayakaāmarāgabyāpādādayo gahitāti
anya-e0104n0:24_18: taṁ tesaṁ matimattaṁ tathā pāṭhasseva abhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:24_19: Jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkā ca nīvaraṇā ceva tadekaṭṭhā ca tesaṁ dūrībhāvaṁ vatvā puna abhāvavigamacodanāya ayujjamānattā.
anya-e0104n0:24_25: idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā sukhumāyeva te gahitā,
anya-e0104n0:24_29: Avassaṁ ce tamevaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ adhigatajjhānānampi kesañci icchāvacarānaṁ pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:25_1: Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti ito paraṁ kattabbassa abhāvavasena abhinīhārakkhamabhāvanāya paripuṇṇattā.
anya-e0104n0:25_2: Paṇītabhāvūpagamenāti tato eva padhānabhāvaṁ nītatāya uttamaṭṭhena,
anya-e0104n0:25_4: Ubhayañcetaṁ ṭhitiyā kāraṇavacanaṁ paripuṇṇāya bhāvanāya paṇītabhāvappattiyā ‘‘ṭhite’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:27_4: Pabbajjaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva jhānamaggā idha nekkhammaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:27_6: Paṭiharatīti pāṭihāriyanti yasmā paṭipakkhaṁ harati apaneti,
anya-e0104n0:29_3: Sā dasavidhāti sabbā iddhiyo ānetvā atthuddhāravasena idhādhippetaṁ iddhiṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:29_4: Bahubhāvādikassa adhiṭṭhānaṁ adhiṭṭhahanaṁ etissā atthīti adhiṭṭhānā.
anya-e0104n0:29_5: Vividhaṁ rūpanimmānasaṅkhātaṁ kubbanaṁ etissā atthīti vikubbanā.
anya-e0104n0:29_7: Ñāṇassa vipphāro vegāyitattaṁ etissā atthīti ñāṇavipphārā.
anya-e0104n0:29_9: Yato kutoci kammavipākato jātā iddhi kammavipākajā.
anya-e0104n0:29_12: itarā yadā tadā puññassa vipaccanakāleti evaṁ vā imāsaṁ viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:30_2: Tena aggahitaparicchedaṁ adhiṭṭhātabbassa anekabhāvaṁ dassetvā puna paricchedato dassetuṁ ‘‘sataṁ vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:30_3: Āvajjatīti parikammasaṅkhātena ābhogena ābhujati bhāvirūpe tena parikammamanasikārena manasi karoti.
anya-e0104n0:30_4: Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti tathā parikammaṁ katvā abhiññāñāṇena yathādhippete bahuke adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0104n0:30_5: adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva bahubhāvāpattito bahubhāvāpādakaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ pavattento ca tathā adhiṭṭhātīti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:32_5: Abhiññāñāṇassa hi yathā manomayo kāyo nipphajjati,
anya-e0104n0:32_12: iddhimatā ca ekantasadise imasmiṁ nimmāne supākaṭo manasā nibbattitabhāvoti yathā sātisayo manomayavohāro,
anya-e0104n0:32_13: na tathā aññāsu adhiṭṭhānavikubbaniddhīsu samaññantaravantāsūti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:33_0: 373.Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vāti arahattamaggañāṇuppattito pubbe vā vipassanākkhaṇe,
anya-e0104n0:33_1: tatopi vā pubbe antimabhavikassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya.
anya-e0104n0:33_5: samantato ca ālokakaraṇasamatthatā viya tasseva ñāṇassa ānubhāvena nibbatto sabbaso pahātabbapahānabhāvetabbabhāvanāpāripūrisaṅkhāto viseso.
anya-e0104n0:33_8: Āraddhavipassanassa hi yathāvuttavipassanāya pavattikkhaṇe tato pubbe,
anya-e0104n0:33_9: pacchā ca pakiṇṇakasammasanavāre niccasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhati.
anya-e0104n0:33_12: vitthārakathāya pana vibhūtataro hotīti āha ‘‘vitthārena kathetabba’’nti.
anya-e0104n0:36_4: Samathānubhāvanibbatto visesoti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ jhāne samādhitejena nibbatto nīvaraṇavikkhambhanavitakkādisamatikkamasaññāvedayitanirodhaparissayasahanādiko viseso.
anya-e0104n0:37_5: Khippanisantibhāvassa ukkaṁsagatattā thero tasmiṁ paharante eva samāpattiṁ samāpajjīti āha ‘‘paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṁ appesī’’ti.
anya-e0104n0:37_6: Pāḷiyaṁ pana ‘‘nisinno hoti aññataraṁ samādhiṁ samāpajjitvā’’ti (udā.
anya-e0104n0:37_8: Ime pana therā samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṁ tena pahāro dinnoti vadanti.
anya-e0104n0:38_0: Sañjīvattheranti kakusandhassa bhagavato dutiyaṁ aggasāvakaṁ mahātheraṁ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0104n0:38_1: So hi āyasmā araññādīsu yattha katthaci nisinno appakasireneva nirodhaṁ samāpajjati,
anya-e0104n0:38_2: tasmā ekadivasaṁ aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nirodhaṁ samāpajji,
anya-e0104n0:38_7: Ayamassāti assa āyasmato sañjīvattherassa yo nirodhasamāpattiyaṁ aggiparissayābhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:39_2: Kālaparicchedavasenāti ‘‘ettake kāle gate vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti samāpattito pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena.
anya-e0104n0:39_3: Bhītā viraviṁsūti rattandhakāre rūpadassanena ‘‘pisāco uṭṭhahatī’’ti maññamānā.
anya-e0104n0:39_4: Ettakehi nāma bhaṇḍakehi ajjhotthaṭo nibbikāro ‘‘aho mahānubhāvo,
anya-e0104n0:41_1: Rājānaṁ mettāya pharīti odissakamettāsamāpattiyā rājānaṁ phusi.
anya-e0104n0:42_9: Ayanti ayaṁ paṭikkūlādivatthūsu apaṭikkūlasaññīvihārādikā khīṇāsavānaṁ aggamaggādhigamasiddhā cittissariyatā.
anya-e0104n0:43_0: Aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṁ sattasaññite mettāpharaṇaṁ vā dhātuso paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṁ vā gūthādike dhātumanasikāraṁ karontoti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:43_2: dhammasabhāvacintanāya ca na paṭikkūlasaññī hutvā iriyāpathavihārena viharati.
anya-e0104n0:43_6: tasmā aniccadukkhānattavipariṇāmadhammoti manasikāraṁ vā karontoti yojanā.
anya-e0104n0:43_7: Paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesūti iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni vatthūni ekajjhaṁ gahetvā vadati.
anya-e0104n0:43_9: Yaṁ vā sattānaṁ paṭhamaṁ paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā apaṭikkūlato upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:43_10: yañca apaṭikkūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā paṭikkūlato upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0104n0:44_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti kāraṇavasena ‘‘cakkhū’’ti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena,

anya-e0104n0:127_0: Pāḷiyañca kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vātiādīsu aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:127_2: Hatthimpītiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṁ bahūnaṁ ekajjhaṁ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṁ samuccayattho pi-saddo vutto.
anya-e0104n0:127_3: Tena ‘‘hatthimpi dassetī’’tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.

anya-e0104n0:128_7: Evamadhiṭṭhite yadeke pathavīkasiṇavasena ‘‘ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’’tiādi (dī. ni. 1.238; ma. ni. 1.147; saṁ. ni. 5.842; paṭi. ma.
